title: Christmas Gift?
body:
Will Riot give anything out for christmas?
Have riot given out anything in the past years?{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}

replies.body: Riot doesn't give anything out for christmas, but that doesn't mean stuff doesn't happen at christmas time. Before featured game modes Riot made SR look all "christmas like", it had snow and everything. There's always "chrismas related" skins that will be released, and since they started with the featured game modes they've been doing that for certain holidays, christmas included. I remember 2 years ago we had "Snowdown Showdown" which was on HA, was 1v1/2v2 and it was first to 100 CS, 5 kills or first turret destroyed (if I remember correctly), that was fun. Then they had "Legend of the Poro King" last year, which is how the Poro Toss summoner spell (and later the Mark summoner spell) came to be. No doubt they've got something planned for this year too.
Wow was snowdown really two years ago? How the time flies.
Riot didn't even give us our own server skin for free, what makes you think they'll give away anything they're not even remotely obligated to give away.
The only gifts we have ever gotten was for not being toxic. With the exception of some event gifts such as, Captain GP for free.
How come Riot doesn't give SR a christmas theme 3 months before the actual christmas day, Woolworths do. Please Riot, don't stoop to Woolworths level.
Riot should give us Permanent URF mode for Christmas, and URFRARAMS
